Uses of Interface
edu.rit.draw.item.Outline

  • Packages that use Outline 
    Package Description
    edu.rit.draw.item
    Package edu.rit.draw.item contains classes for the different kinds of drawing items that can appear in a Drawing.

    • Uses of Outline in edu.rit.draw.item

      Classes in edu.rit.draw.item that implement Outline 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DashedOutline
      Class DashedOutline provides an object that outlines an area in a DrawingItem with a square-cornered dashed stroke in a solid color.
      class  DottedOutline
      Class DottedOutline provides an object that outlines an area in a DrawingItem with a round dotted stroke in a solid color.
      class  RoundSolidOutline
      Class RoundSolidOutline provides an object that outlines an area in a DrawingItem with a round-cornered solid stroke in a solid color.
      class  SolidOutline
      Class SolidOutline provides an object that outlines an area in a DrawingItem with a square-cornered solid stroke in a solid color.
      class  SquareDottedOutline
      Class SquareDottedOutline provides an object that outlines an area in a DrawingItem with a square-cornered dotted stroke in a solid color.
      Fields in edu.rit.draw.item declared as Outline 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Outline Outline.NONE
      Specify Outline.NONE to omit drawing a drawing item's outline.
      static Outline OutlinedItem.NORMAL_OUTLINE
      The normal outline: Solid, square corners, 1 point wide, black.
      Methods in edu.rit.draw.item that return Outline 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Outline OutlinedItem.defaultOutline()
      Returns the default outline.
      Outline OutlinedItem.outline()
      Returns this outlined item's outline.
      Methods in edu.rit.draw.item with parameters of type Outline 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void OutlinedItem.defaultOutline(Outline theOutline)
      Set the default outline.
      Ellipse Ellipse.outline(Outline theOutline)
      Set this ellipse's outline.
      Wedge Wedge.outline(Outline theOutline)
      Set this wedge's outline.
      Rectangle Rectangle.outline(Outline theOutline)
      Set this rectangle's outline.
      OutlinedItem OutlinedItem.outline(Outline theOutline)
      Set this outlined item's outline.
      Line Line.outline(Outline theOutline)
      Set this line's outline.
      FilledItem FilledItem.outline(Outline theOutline)
      Set this filled item's outline.
      RectangularItem RectangularItem.outline(Outline theOutline)
      Set this rectangular item's outline.
      ShapeItem ShapeItem.outline(Outline theOutline)
      Set this shape item's outline.
      Oval Oval.outline(Outline theOutline)
      Set this oval's outline.
      Arc Arc.outline(Outline theOutline)
      Set this arc's outline.
      Bow Bow.outline(Outline theOutline)
      Set this bowed line's outline.
      Polygon Polygon.outline(Outline theOutline)
      Set this polygon's outline.
